name: If only i could go home early (itch)
name_original: If only i could go home early (itch)
description:
This is a Point & Click game about an interesting wife.

This is a level-based game about a love story.

This is a pixel-art game about a man's dream and pessimism to life.

----

Game Story

You are an office worker and always work late.

One day when you came home from working overtime, you found your wife dead on the ground.

Don't worry, she's just pretending to be dead, and this isn't the first time.

Try to find the right way make her up. After all, the floor is cold and you love her.

----

Note you know

This is a free version with 8 levels. （total is 20 or 21 levels depends on if you unlocked the hiddened level.)

If you are interested in this game, you can download the full version from Google play or app store.

Maybe i will provide a full version at there some days. I am not sure if it is a good choice and I am a new bird in this funny place.

----

Oh last important thing

I am glad if you provide any feedback about this game and thanks a lot if you purchasing this game.

Besides that, If you have any suggestions or ideas about this game, please let me know.

Language

Provide English, 日本語, 繁體中文, 简体中文 right now.
